title: UK FCA crypto skills gap is causing slow enforcement, says National Audit Office
description:
The National Audit Office emphasized that it took nearly three years for the UK Financial Conduct Authority to address illicit activity in crypto ATMs across the country.

The National Audit Office (NAO) in the United Kingdom has raised concerns about the effectiveness of the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) in regulating the cryptocurrency industry.

In a recent report titled 'Financial services regulation: adapting to change,' the NAO has claimed that the FCA is being slow to respond and take action against illicit activities in the crypto industry.

The NAO also claim that the lack of specialized crypto employees within the FCA, was the cause of the delay in registering crypto firms that were seeking regulatory approval. 

Read more

title: How the US Justice Department Will Be Monitoring Binance’s Operations: Former SEC Lawyer John Reed Stark Calls It a ‘Financial Colonoscopy’
description: Yesterday, John Reed Stark, a former Chief of the SEC’s Office of Internet Enforcement and currently the president of Stark Consulting, shared his thoughts on the significant legal challenges facing Binance. Stark’s analysis, posted on social media platform X on 9 December 2023, dives into the implications of recent U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) filings […]

title: U.S. Department of Defense Embarks on Pioneering Aeronautics Innovations for National Security
description: The United States Department of Defense (DoD) is undertaking a comprehensive initiative to enhance national security through cutting-edge technological advancements. Rooted in principles outlined by the National Security Strategy and National Defense Strategy, the DoD’s focus is on fortifying its technological edge through dedicated research and innovation in aeronautics.
